original_text: King Jehoiakim paid Pharaoh Necho all the silver and gold that he asked for. But King Jehoiakim had to make the people of Judah pay taxes so that he could pay Pharaoh Necho. Each person in Judah had to pay what was right, if they were rich or if they were poor.
korean_text: 여호야김이 은과 금을 바로에게 주니라 그가 바로 느고의 명령대로 그에게 그 돈을 주기 위하여 나라에 부과하되 백성들 각 사람의 힘대로 액수를 정하고 은금을 징수하였더라

sentences.original_text: King Jehoiakim paid Pharaoh Necho all the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야킴 왕은 바로느고에게 모든 은과 금을 지불했습니다

sentences.original_text: But King Jehoiakim had to make the people of Judah pay taxes
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여호야킴 왕은 유다 백성들에게 세금을 내게 해야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: so that he could pay Pharaoh Necho
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 바로느고에게 지불할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Each person in Judah had to pay what was right
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 각 사람은 마땅한 것을 지불해야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: if they were rich or if they were poor
